General.Name: Guangdong Eastone Century Technology Co Ltd
General.Description: Eastone Century Technology Co.,Ltd. provides communication network technology services and system solutions to telecom operators and equipment manufacturers in China. The company offers engineering, construction, maintenance, optimization, and other technical services for communication, wireless, transmission, and other networks; integrated, business support, and IT system solutions; tag analytics big data services; and communications big data business identification services. It also engages in the research and development of communication equipment; and production and sales business. The company was formerly known as Guangdong Eastone Century Technology Co.,Ltd. Eastone Century Technology Co.,Ltd. was founded in 2001 and is based in Guangzhou, China.
General.Address: Building A, Guangzhou Information Port, Guangzhou, China, 510630
